trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o controlo que redistribui com espaço entre colunas ou linhas de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de GridSplitter redistribui com espaço entre linhas ou colunas num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>sem alterar as dimensões de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um GridSplitter redimensiona duas colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>propriedade de uma coluna é aumentada enquanto ao mesmo tempo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>propriedade da outra coluna é diminuída através da mesma quantidade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra como definir um GridSplitter horizontal ou vertical definindo a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades e deixando os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>Propriedades definidas para os respetivos valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **Como criar controlos de GridSplitter verticais e horizontais** | Tipo de GridSplitter | valor de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>| valor de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Redimensiona linhas | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Redimensiona colunas | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>é maior que ou igual a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isto redimensiona as colunas.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>for inferior a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, isto redimensiona as linhas. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| Um GridSplitter pode sobrepor-se de uma linha ou coluna que contém outros conteúdos ou pode ocupam uma linha ou coluna por si só.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre como definir um GridSplitter, consulte [como: Redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: Redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>definições de propriedade não alcançarem o comportamento de GridSplitter pretendido, pode alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>definições de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Um GridSplitter poderá ser ficar obscurecida por outros objetos que estão contidos na <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como evitar esta situação, consulte [como: Sure Certifique-se um GridSplitter é Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de dependência para este controlo podem ser definidas pelo estilo de predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se uma propriedade é definida por um estilo predefinido, a propriedade poderá alterar o valor predefinido do quando o controlo é apresentado na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: O estilo predefinido é determinado pelo qual tema de ambiente de trabalho é utilizado quando a aplicação está em execução.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [predefinido o WPF temas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância mínima que um utilizador tem arraste um rato para redimensionar linhas ou colunas com um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: A distância mínima que é definida pela DragIncrement é reinicializada continuamente como o utilizador arrasta o rato.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando arraste o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>pela quantidade DragIncrement, as linhas ou colunas são redimensionadas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionar linhas e colunas mais, tem de arrastar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>mesma quantidade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, é alterado para tamanhos de linha e coluna que são efetuados utilizando o rato ou o teclado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>são efetuadas em múltiplos do DragIncrement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que representa a distância mínima que um utilizador tem de utilizar o rato para arrastar um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> para redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância que cada prima de uma tecla de seta move um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: A distância que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> move para cada prima de uma tecla de seta.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 10.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria a implementação de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma tecla é premida.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo perde o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração de dimensões do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controlo determina o tipo de ponteiro para apresentar após a respetiva <xref:System.Windows.Size>está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a alteração do tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo customizes o aspeto, efeitos ou outras características de estilo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> indicador de pré-visualização do controlo que é apresentado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir os estilos, existem algumas restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos e Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização do atributo de XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `ResourceExtension` um dos seguintes: `StaticResource` ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [XAML recursos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`A chave identifica o estilo de que está a ser solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente no <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sintaxe do elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não recomendadas.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [Inline estilos e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência de enlace utilizando ou <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>é também possível, mas invulgar.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | Uma versão de pré-visualização de alterações a limites de linha ou coluna é apresentada ao drags utilizador a controlo e o propriedade está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Os limites de linha e coluna estão definidos quando o utilizador liberta o botão do rato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> para o indicador de pré-visualização que mostra o potencial alteração no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> dimensões como mover a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o estilo que fornece o tema actual.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas relativo para a coluna ou uma linha para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo está definido.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: Se não é possível alcançar o comportamento pretendido, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades, altere o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>ou os valores predefinidos de ResizeBehavior.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: Redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: Redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que indica as colunas ou linhas são redimensionadas por este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo redimensiona linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>que redimensiona linhas ou colunas, defina o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se não é possível alcançar o comportamento pretendido, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>Propriedades, altere o ResizeDirection ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: Redimensionar linhas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [como: Redimensionar colunas com um GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores da enumeração que especifica se pretende redimensionar linhas ou colunas.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controlo atualiza o tamanho de linha ou coluna como o utilizador arrasta o controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>requer um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto para estar presente na respetiva árvore principal para apresentar a comentários de pré-visualização de arrastar.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Este requisito é satisfeito normalmente o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto que está disponível no estilo predefinido para o <xref:System.Windows.Window>ou no <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto que é criado por uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se nenhum destes estiver disponível, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controlo tem de definir as suas próprias <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | Quando a propriedade ShowsPreview está definida como `true`, é apresentada uma pré-visualização da alteração em tamanhos de linha ou coluna.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho real é alterado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>é libertado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade estiver definida como `false`, os tamanhos de linha ou coluna são atualizados em tempo real, como os utilizador drags o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se for utilizado o teclado para mover o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>tamanhos de controlo, linha ou coluna são atualizados em tempo real, mesmo se a propriedade ShowsPreview estiver definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> pré-visualização está apresentado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
